siteMetadata.description: Full Stack Engineer with 19+ years of experience building web applications, eCommerce platforms, and CMSs. Adept in JavaScript (TypeScript, Node, React, VueJs), PHP (Laravel, Symfony), and DevOps (AWS, Docker, Terraform). Solid and proven leadership skills in managing small and medium engineering teams.
